Muy bueno para pasar el tiempo y profesionalizarse con juegos shooters!
Tactical shooter with a massive learning curve, yet despite the learning curve it can be quite enjoyable.  Players are toxic but friendly, most will try to help you learn the game if you ask nicely.

Not much needs to be said. Not very forgiving for new players, but the high skill ceiling means that practice feels very rewarding. It's also good for people with less powerful PCs.
Mind the toxicity though.
Also due to the way the ranking system works if you play a lot you will probably improve faster than you rank up, which can be extremely frustrating.
Also if you don't get prime and have a high trust factor there'l be spin bots every few games which is always fun.
alot of other good fps games

Would not recommend this game to anyone who is new. The game is full of toxic people along side the people who have no idea what a mouse is. If you want a game to play and have fun i would recommend TF2 over this game, as with the drop in over all mental capacity of people in the game, combined with the over all huge leap in toxicity, this game has dropped from a game to have fun in, to a game where if you are not good you will be kicked from every game and never be able to play, even if you play with friends it's no fun, mostly due to the unfair ranking system it has, where the game tries to place you in a game with people of the same skill, but even that fails horribly.


Edit: The game seems to have gotten better, you still have pretty bad games and the ranking is still broken, it can be enjoyable with friends but I still wouldn't recommend it.
Good game, will very much spend my life savings gambling away on it :)
It just sucks .... unplayable because of 15 % normal players and 85 % cheaters. Ty for that !
